-> print -> æ‰§è¡Œäº†3sstarted at 17:13:52helloworldfinished at 17:13:553. asyncio.create_task()å‡½æ•°ç”¨æ¥å¹¶å‘è¿è¡Œ ä½œä¸º asyncio ä»»åŠ¡çš„ å¤šä¸ªåç¨‹ã€‚ å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šasync def main():    task1 = asyncio.create_task(        say_after(1, 'hello'))     task2 = asyncio.create_task(        say_after(2, 'world'))     print(f"started at {time.strftime('%X')}")     # Wait until both tasks are completed (should take    # around 2 seconds.)    await task1    await task2     print(f"finished at {time.strftime('%X')}") # -> print -> æ‰§è¡Œäº†2sstarted at 17:14:32helloworldfinished at 17:14:344. asyncio.TaskGroup ç±»æä¾›äº† create_task() çš„æ›´ç°ä»£åŒ–çš„æ›¿ä»£ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨æ­¤ APIï¼Œä¹‹å‰çš„ä¾‹å­å°†å˜ä¸º:async def main():    async with asyncio.TaskGroup() as tg:        task1 = tg.create_task(say_after(1, 'hello'))        task2 = tg.create_task(say_after(2, 'world'))        print(f"started at {time.strftime('%X')}")    print(f"finished at {time.strftime('%X')}")asyncio.run(main())### å¯ç­‰å¾…å¯¹è±¡å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥åœ¨ await è¯­å¥ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå°±æ˜¯ å¯ç­‰å¾… å¯¹è±¡ã€‚è®¸å¤š asyncio API éƒ½è¢«è®¾è®¡ä¸ºæ¥å—å¯ç­‰å¾…å¯¹è±¡ã€‚å¯ç­‰å¾… å¯¹è±¡æœ‰ä¸‰ç§ä¸»è¦ç±»å‹: åç¨‹ã€ä»»åŠ¡ å’Œ Future.#### åç¨‹Python åç¨‹å±äº å¯ç­‰å¾… å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥åœ¨å…¶ä»–åç¨‹ä¸­è¢«ç­‰å¾…:async def nested():    return 42 async def main():    # æ­¤æ—¶åªè°ƒç”¨ 'nested()' ä»€ä¹ˆä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿã€‚    # çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯ åç¨‹å¯¹è±¡å·²åˆ›å»ºä½†æœªç­‰å¾…ï¼Œ    # æ‰€ä»¥æ ¹æœ¬ä¸ä¼šè¿è¡Œ*ã€‚    nested()    print(await nested())  # will print "42". asyncio.run(main())PS:åœ¨æœ¬æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­ â€œåç¨‹â€ å¯ç”¨æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºä¸¤ä¸ªç´§å¯†å…³è”çš„æ¦‚å¿µ:1. åç¨‹å‡½æ•°: å®šä¹‰å½¢å¼ä¸º async def çš„å‡½æ•°;2. åç¨‹å¯¹è±¡: è°ƒç”¨ åç¨‹å‡½æ•° æ‰€è¿”å›çš„å¯¹è±¡ã€‚ä»»åŠ¡ä»»åŠ¡ è¢«ç”¨æ¥ â€˜å¹¶è¡Œçš„â€™ è°ƒåº¦åç¨‹å½“ä¸€ä¸ªåç¨‹é€šè¿‡ asyncio.create_task() ç­‰å‡½æ•°è¢«å°è£…ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ª ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œè¯¥åç¨‹ä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒåº¦æ‰§è¡Œ:

1. Base64åŠ å¯†/è§£å¯†Base64æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ç”¨äºå°†äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬æ ¼å¼ï¼Œä»è€Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç½‘ç»œä¸Šæˆ–å…¶ä»–ä¸æ”¯æŒäºŒè¿›åˆ¶ä¼ è¾“çš„ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ä¼ è¾“æ•°æ®ã€‚Base64ç¼–ç æ–¹æ³•æ¶‰åŠåˆ°å°†åŸå§‹äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®åˆ†å‰²æˆå›ºå®šçš„å°å—ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå°å—éƒ½ä»¥6bitçš„å½¢å¼è¡¨ç¤ºä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚
pythonçš„base64åº“æä¾›äº†Base64ç¼–ç /è§£ç çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç å’Œè§£ç æ“ä½œï¼š
import base64# ç¼–ç data = b'hello world'encoded_data = base64.b64encode(data)print(encoded_data)# è§£ç decoded_data = base64.b64decode(encoded_data)print(decoded_data)

2. MD5åŠ å¯†MD5æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å“ˆå¸Œç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†ä»»æ„é•¿åº¦çš„æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå›ºå®šé•¿åº¦çš„hashå€¼ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ç”¨äºå¯†ç åŠ å¯†ã€æ•°å­—ç­¾åç­‰æ–¹é¢ã€‚MD5ç®—æ³•æ˜¯å•å‘çš„ä¸å¯é€†çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°å¯†ç æ³„éœ²çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚

import hashlib# åŠ å¯†data = b'hello world'md5 = hashlib.md5()md5.update(data)encrypted_data = md5.hexdigest()print(encrypted_data)

3. SHA1åŠ å¯†SHA1æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å®‰å…¨å“ˆå¸Œç®—æ³•ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºMD5ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†ä»»æ„é•¿åº¦çš„æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå›ºå®šé•¿åº¦çš„hashå€¼ã€‚åœ¨å¯†ç å­¦å®‰å…¨æ€§æ–¹é¢ï¼ŒSHA1æ¯”MD5æ›´ä¸ºå¯é ï¼Œä½†åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œæ•ˆç‡ã€ç¢°æ’æ£€æµ‹ç­‰æ–¹é¢ç•¥é€Šä¸€ç­¹ã€‚
ä½¿ç”¨pythonçš„hashlibåº“ä¸­çš„SHA1ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç±»ä¼¼äºMD5ä¸€æ ·è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†æ“ä½œï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š
import hashlib#åŠ å¯†data = b'hello world'sha1 = hashlib.sha1()sha1.update(data)encrypted_data = sha1.hexdigest()print(encrypted_data)

4. AESåŠ å¯†AESæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é«˜çº§åŠ å¯†æ ‡å‡†ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç›®å‰åº”ç”¨å¹¿æ³›çš„åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚ä¸å‰é¢ä¸‰ç§ç®—æ³•ä¸åŒï¼ŒAESç®—æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹ç§°åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„å¯†é’¥è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†æ“ä½œã€‚AESç®—æ³•æ”¯æŒå¤šç§å¯†é’¥é•¿åº¦å’ŒåŠ å¯†æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å®é™…éœ€æ±‚è¿›è¡Œè°ƒæ•´ã€‚
pythonçš„pycryptodomeåº“æä¾›äº†AESç®—æ³•çš„å®ç°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†æ“ä½œï¼š
from Crypto.Cipher import AESimport base64# åŠ å¯†data = b'hello world'key = b'this is a secret key'mode = AES.MODE_CBCiv = b'1234567890123456'encryptor = AES.new(key, mode, iv)encrypted_data = encryptor.encrypt(data)encoded_data = base64.b64encode(encrypted_data)print(encoded_data)# è§£å¯†decoded_data = base64.b64decode(encoded_data)decryptor = AES.new(key, mode, iv)decrypted_data = decryptor.decrypt(decoded_data)print(decrypted_data)

5. RSAåŠ å¯†RSAåŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éå¯¹ç§°åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒéœ€è¦ä¸¤ä¸ªå¯†é’¥ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå…¬é’¥å’Œç§é’¥ã€‚å…¬é’¥å¯ä»¥å…¬å¼€ï¼Œç”¨äºåŠ å¯†æ•°æ®ï¼›ç§é’¥ä¿å¯†ï¼Œç”¨äºè§£å¯†æ•°æ®ã€‚RSAç®—æ³•ä¸ä»…å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºåŠ å¯†è§£å¯†ï¼Œè¿˜å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºæ•°å­—ç­¾åã€èº«ä»½è®¤è¯ç­‰ã€‚
ä½¿ç”¨pythonçš„Cryptoåº“ä¸­çš„RSAç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”Ÿæˆå¯†é’¥å¯¹ã€è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†æ“ä½œï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSAfrom Crypto.Cipher import PKCS1_v1_5import base64# ç”ŸæˆRSAå¯†é’¥å¯¹key = RSA.generate(1024)private_key = key.export_key()public_key = key.publickey().export_key()# å…¬é’¥åŠ å¯†ï¼Œç§é’¥è§£å¯†data = b'hello world'rsakey = RSA.import_key(private_key)cipher = PKCS1_v1_5.new(rsakey)encrypted_data = base64.b64encode(cipher.encrypt(data))print(encrypted_data)rsakey = RSA.import_key(public_key)cipher = PKCS1_v1_5.new(rsakey)decrypted_data = cipher.decrypt(base64.b64decode(encrypted_data), None)print(decrypted_data)

from math import sqrt  class Triangle:    def __init__(self, a, b, c):        self._a = a        self._b = b        self._c = c     @staticmethod    def is_valid(a, b, c):        return a + b > c and a + c > b and b + c > a     def perimeter(self):        return self._a + self._b + self._c     def area(self):        half = self.perimeter() / 2        return sqrt(half * (half - self._a) *                    (half - self._b) * (half - self._c))  def main():    a, b, c = 3, 4, 5    if Triangle.is_valid(a, b, c):        t = Triangle(a, b, c)        print(t.area())        print(t.perimeter())    else:        print("æ— æ³•æ„æˆä¸‰è§’å½¢")  if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

from time import time, localtime, sleep  class Clock:     def __init__(self, hour=0, minute=0, second=0):        self._hour = hour        self._minute = minute        self._second = second     @classmethod    def new(cls):        ctime = localtime(time())        return cls(ctime.tm_hour, ctime.tm_min, ctime.tm_sec)     def run(self):        self._second += 1        if self._second == 60:            self._second = 0            self._minute += 1            if self._minute == 60:                self._minute = 0                self._hour += 1                if self._hour == 24:                    self._hour = 0     def show(self):        return f'å½“å‰æ—¶é—´ï¼š{self._hour:0>2d}-{self._minute:0>2d}-{self._second:0>2d}'  def main():    clock = Clock.new()    while True:        print(clock.show())        clock.run()        sleep(1)        os.system('cls')  if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

class Person(object):    """äºº"""     def __init__(self, name, age):        self._name = name        self._age = int(age)     @property    def name(self):        return self._name     @property    def age(self):        return self._age     @age.setter    def age(self, age):        self._age = age     def play(self):        print('%sæ­£åœ¨æ„‰å¿«çš„ç©è€.' % self._name)     def watch_av(self):        if self._age >= 18:            print('%sæ­£åœ¨è§‚çœ‹çˆ±æƒ…åŠ¨ä½œç‰‡.' % self._name)        else:            print('%såªèƒ½è§‚çœ‹ã€Šç†Šå‡ºæ²¡ã€‹.' % self._name)  class Student(Person):    def __init__(self, name, age, grade):        super().__init__(name, age)        self._grade = grade     @property    def grade(self):        return self._grade     @grade.setter    def grade(self, grade):        self._grade = grade     def study(self, course):        return f'{self._grade} çš„ {self._name} æ­£åœ¨å­¦ä¹  {course}'  if __name__ == '__main__':    stu = Student('å°æ˜', '19', 'é«˜äºŒ')    print(stu.study('æ•°å­¦'))    stu.watch_av()

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod  class Pet(ABC):    """å® ç‰©"""     def __init__(self, nickname):        self._nickname = nickname     @abstractmethod    def make_voice(self):        """å‘å‡ºå£°éŸ³"""        pass  class Dog(Pet):    """ç‹—"""     def make_voice(self):        print('%s: æ±ªæ±ªæ±ª...' % self._nickname)  class Cat(Pet):    """çŒ«"""     def make_voice(self):        print('%s: å–µ...å–µ...' % self._nickname)  def main():    pets = [Dog('æ—ºè´¢'), Cat('å‡¯è’‚'), Dog('å¤§é»„')]    for pet in pets:        pet.make_voice()  if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

from threading import Thread  class Download(Thread):    def __init__(self, filename):        self._filename = filename        super().__init__()     def run(self):        print(f'å¼€å§‹ä¸‹è½½ {self._filename}')        time_to_download = random.randint(5, 10)        time.sleep(time_to_download)        print(f'ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ {self._filename}, èŠ±è´¹äº†{time_to_download}s')  def main():    start = time.time()    t1 = Download('é¹¿é¼è®°')    t1.start()     t2 = Download('çº¢æ¥¼æ¢¦')    t2.start()     t1.join()    t2.join()    end = time.time()    print(f'å…±èŠ±è´¹äº† {end - start:.2f}s')  if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

import requestsfrom lxml import etreefrom concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor urls = [    f'https://www.cnblogs.com/#p{page}'    for page in range(1, 51)]  def craw(url):    response = requests.get(url)    response.encoding = 'utf-8'    page_text = response.text    return page_text  def parse(html):    tree = etree.HTML(html)    names = tree.xpath('//*[@id="post_list"]/article/section/div/a/text()')    for name in names:        fout.write(str(name) + '\n')  ## start = time.time()# with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=10) as pool:#     craw_futures = [pool.submit(craw, url) for url in urls]# end = time.time()# print(f'crawå®Œæˆ- {end - start} s')## start = time.time()# with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=10) as executor:#     fout = open('./q1.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8')#     for craw_future in craw_futures:#         html = craw_future.result()#         parse_future = executor.submit(parse, html)# end = time.time()# print(f'parseå®Œæˆ- {end-start} s') # å¢åŠ å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°def parse(craw_future):    html = craw_future.result()    tree = etree.HTML(html)    names = tree.xpath('//*[@id="post_list"]/article/section/div/a/text()')    for name in names:        fout.write(str(name) + '\n')  start = time.time()with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=10) as pool:    fout = open('./q1.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8')    craw_futures = [pool.submit(craw, url) for url in urls]    for craw_future in craw_futures:        craw_future.add_done_callback(parse)fout.close()end = time.time()print(f'å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆ- {end - start} s')
